Articles.Content:
> 
> What did I just watch, oh dear...

That, my friend, is called Anime.

> 
> Then you shall PERISH!
> 
> 
> The bridge holding the molecules apart has collapsed, and they will now fuse with each other; the two most powerful known substances. The nuclei become unstable, and each one collapses, expending the same energy that enveloped the thousands of light years worth of space called OgS, but all contained within a much smaller space, causing a greater effect, and leaving no room for error.
> 
> I then proceed back to the moon in which I live, and work on synthesizing more.

With utmost haste I devise a mechanism of separating myself from space-time, so as to escape the destruction of the known universe.... and I succeed! I claim this barren waste as my own and, since none of you exist in this realm, none of you can touch

MY HILL!
I deleted the realm. Nine dimensions left. My lack of a hill.
the megaverse still stands, inside me. findthepin is put in stasis in my trophy room. no power cuts, and if one happens, the marines will kill all aliove exhibits.

I sit comfortably in my realm, as the destruction continues outside it.

My Hill

You sit down on your hill, calmly watching all the nuclear explosions on the horizon, until...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/OZ1-yNTWXj4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My alien-infested hill.

The US Government seizes your hill for its proof of aliens existing, and you are knocked unconscious, waking up in a mysterious interrogation room.

I build a train that is completely bulletproof, and park it on a wooden trestle bridge for the night.

My train on a bridge.

It might be bulletproof, but is it kerbal-illuminati-proof?

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/NDhrkCDP_QE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My Kerbal Illuminati train.

Illuminati deleted from time by Doctor Who, therefore they never seize the train.

My bulletproof train on a wooden bridge.

lol no

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zsTRxXvQY0s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My crater.

> 
> lol no
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zsTRxXvQY0s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> My crater.

I build a new railway that is on the east bank of the Mississippi River. I build a bridge over the river, and park a nuke-proof, bulletproof train on it. The Universe Government bans any weapon use against trains.

> 
> I build a new railway that is on the east bank of the Mississippi River. I build a bridge over the river, and park a nuke-proof, bulletproof train on it. The Universe Government bans any weapon use against trains.

I plant explosives on the support structures, the government forbade action against trains, not bridges.

Hey, remember that nuclear bomb?

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eukb4C2Dg-E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My radioactive debris.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-16T16:01:16Z" title="06/16/2015 04:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 16, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**
  
ayy lmao; dose aleins

TIME FOR AUSTRALIAN HILL!

I hollow out the hill and fill it with AUSTRALIUM.

MY SUPER-MANLY HILL.

The hill still has some radioactivity.

My radioactive hill.

I have Dr. Banner move in on your hill.

My Incredible Hulk

...Nope.

Not fighting that. He's bad enough WITHOUT the effects of Australium exposure!

He may keep his hill, I will simply wall it off for everyone's safety.

I send a bunch of Security Bots and Mosquito Turrets to the wall to protect it against anyone who attempts to destory the wall.

My hill.

( [http://bioshock.wikia.com/wiki/Security_Bot](http://bioshock.wikia.com/wiki/Security_Bot)

[http://bioshock.wikia.com/wiki/Mosquito](http://bioshock.wikia.com/wiki/Mosquito) if you don't know)

Two words.

Tactical Nuke.

My hill ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Three words.

That Same Thing.

My crater.

I refill the crater with gravel.

My gravel hill.

Both RED and BLU start fighting over the gravel, under orders.

No one's hill until the whole TF2 stuff ends.
That's fine with me. I got my own aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaalllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll the way over here.

I dig a tunnel network under your hill, leading to collapse.

My collapsed hill.

A wild MONOCULUS! appears!

Wat do?

MONOCULUS!'s hill.

Monoculus banned by the universe's government.

Control of the hill transferred to the railroad.

My hill.
